SEARCH
Package cdx.opencdx.commons.service.impl

Class MongoDocumentValidatorImpl

java.lang.Object
cdx.opencdx.commons.service.impl.MongoDocumentValidatorImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
OpenCDXDocumentValidator
@Component public class MongoDocumentValidatorImpl extends Object implements OpenCDXDocumentValidator
This class is used to validate if a document exists in a collection.
